stdout:
Table	Create Table
mosques	CREATE TABLE `mosques` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `name` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `latitude` decimal(10,8) DEFAULT NULL,
  `longitude` decimal(11,8) DEFAULT NULL,
  `address` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `city` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `district` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `area` decimal(10,2) DEFAULT NULL,
  `capacity` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `status` enum('new','existing','under_construction') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'new',
  `ownership` enum('government','waqf','private') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'waqf',
  `imamName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `imamPhone` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `imamEmail` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `registeredBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `approvedBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `approvalStatus` enum('pending','approved','rejected') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT 'pending',
  `approvalDate` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `notes` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `mosques_registeredBy_users_id_fk` (`registeredBy`),
  KEY `mosques_approvedBy_users_id_fk` (`approvedBy`),
  CONSTRAINT `mosques_registeredBy_users_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`registeredBy`) REFERENCES `6TUn3HPSK4hJ6Fxv2aR83j`.`users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION,
  CONSTRAINT `mosques_approvedBy_users_id_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`approvedBy`) REFERENCES `6TUn3HPSK4hJ6Fxv2aR83j`.`users` (`id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE NO ACTION
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
